name: 4x4 Delivery Trucker Premium
description:
Deliver cargo on your awesome 4x4 or 6x6 truck! Get through tough offroad levels! Upgrade and customize your truck to become the best off-roader! Conquer the elements with forest, desert, and winter levels! Pick any color for your truck or SUV.

This premium version comes without forced ads and with an additional currency pack.

Buy upgrades for your truck, beat all the levels with each truck!

11 American and Russian trucks and jeeps to choose from are included, inspired by:

- 2013 Dodge Ram 3500 Dually + trailer
- 1990 Jeep Wrangler
- 1980 Ford E150 Econoline flatbed 4x4
- 1995 Ford Transit 4x4
- 1970 Ford F600 4x4
- MTVR 6x6
- Lada Niva 2121
- GAZ 66
- GAZ Gazelle 3302
- UAZ 452D
- URAL 4320

Also:
- 64 increasingly challenging levels and 6 classes of trucks to complete them with
- Nearly each class currently contains 2 trucks
- Tilt, button, and steering wheel controls, adjustable sensitivity
- Tunable graphics settings to accomodate any device, change the quality, shadow level and resolution scaling.
- Realistic physics complete with live axle simulation where appropriate
- Upgrades for your truck's engine, suspension, wheels and 4x4, and the truck bed
- Exterior and interior cockpit cameras
- Earn gems by delivering 100% of the cargo
- Use gems to purchase upgrades and boosters
- Daily gem rewards
